item.title: Speaker - Gatherverse Summit 2025
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: ðŸ“¢ Gatherverse Summit 2025: Innovating for Human Betterment Now and Forever. Climb. GatherVerse Summit 2025 marks the fourth annual gathering of global experts and community leaders discussing humanity-first standards in the approach to AI, the metaverse, and emerging technologies I’m excited to be part of the Roundtable Panel Discussion on “The Metaverse United : How AI and XR Can Deepen Human Connections” alongside industry leaders and innovators! ðŸ—“ Session Details Date & Time: Feb 25, 2025, 11:20 AM - 12:10 PM PST Roundtable Panel: The Metaverse United : How AI and XR Can Deepen Human Connections Moderator: Lynn Gitau - Director of Communications, Gatherverse Panelists: Casey Jensen - Head of Client Partnerships, Zebrar Kuldeep Singh - Me David B.

item.title: Speaker - Gatherverse Virtual World Symposium 2024
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: ðŸ“¢ Virtual World Symposium: Join us as we dive deep into the future of AI-powered virtual worlds: What are they? Where are they headed? And why is it crucial to discuss these transformative spaces to..day? This symposium will also unpack spatial intelligence and its role in defining and enhancing immersive environments. As we step into a new era of digital interaction, this event will provide insights into the challenges and opportunities that virtual worlds bring to society.
